mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.meirijihua_name as meirijihuaName ,a.yinshi_text as yinshiText ,a.yundong_text as yundongText ,a.yaopin_text as yaopinText ,a.meirijihua_content as meirijihuaContent ,a.meirijihua_time as meirijihuaTime ,a.meirijihua_delete as meirijihuaDelete ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM meirijihua a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.meirijihua_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.meirijihuaName},'%')
and a.yinshi_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.yinshiText},'%')
and a.yundong_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.yundongText},'%')
and a.yaopin_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.yaopinText},'%')
and a.meirijihua_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.meirijihuaContent},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.meirijihua_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.meirijihuaTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.meirijihua_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.meirijihuaTimeEnd})
and a.meirijihua_delete >= #{params.meirijihuaDeleteStart}
and a.meirijihua_delete <= #{params.meirijihuaDeleteEnd}
and a.meirijihua_delete = #{params.meirijihuaDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
